availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Matthew and Jane Thompson. Married to Sabrina Thompson. Father of Susan Thompson and John Thompson. Clerk in Todd County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 1, p. 196B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 27. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Precinct 1, p. 6.
